mapper.insert: insert into post (title, contents, category_no, reg_date) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{categoryNo }, now())
mapper.select: select count(*) from post join category where category.no = post.category_no and category.blog_id = #{blogId} and category.no = #{categoryNo}
